law.catch_line: Responsibilities of agencies and educational institutions receiving agriculturally related funding.

text.section: Those agencies and educational institutions that receive agriculturally related funding under the provisions of KRS 248.701 to 248.727, and those that receive state funding relating to assisting agriculture and farmers in this state shall devote efforts to revitalization and diversification of tobacco farms.

Each agency or institution in subsection (1) of this section shall issue a semiannual report on the details of the efforts it is carrying out to revitalize and diversify tobacco farms. The report shall include details of successes that have been achieved and shall be provided to the subcommittee created in KRS 248.723.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 530, sec. 14, effective April 26, 2000.
